item.title: SIPAM GeoNetwork - Portal para dados e informacoes espaciais
item.author: SIPAM

item.title: WFP GeoNetwork opensource portal to spatial data and information
item.description: WFP GeoNetwork opensource provides Internet access to interactive maps, satellite imagery and related spatial databases. It's purpose is to improve access to and integrated use of spatial data and information. GeoNetwork opensource allows to easily share spatial data among different users
item.author: WFP
